title: Watermelon cooler
description: You don't need a juicer to make this tasty watermelon drink. Make it a few hours in advance as it's best served chilled.

show.b01ncdlj: I Can Cook on the Go

steps: Mash the watermelon in a bowl, then stir in the lemon juice.
Sieve the watermelon into a jug and press down gently on the pulp to extract all the juice.
Pour the juice into glasses filled with ice and garnish with the mint.
